tools.name: accounts_list
tools.description: List all accounts in your Cloudflare account

tools.name: set_active_account
tools.description: Set active account to be used for tool calls that require accountId

activeAccountIdParam.description: The accountId present in the users Cloudflare account, that should be the active accountId.

location.description: Filters results by location. Specify a valid alpha-2 location code.

tools.name: get_as_details
tools.description: Get Autonomous System details by ASN

asn.description: Autonomous System Number (ASN), must be a positive number.

ip.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address in standard notation.

asn.description: Autonomous System Number (ASN), must be a positive number.

location.description: Filters results by location. Specify a valid alpha-2 location code.

dateRange.description: Filters results by date range. For example, use `7d` and `7dcontrol` to compare this week with the previous week. Use this parameter or set specific start and end dates (`dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters).

dateStart.description: Start date in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2023-04-01T00:00:00Z). Either use this parameter together with `dateEnd`, or use `dateRange`.

dateEnd.description: End date in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2023-04-30T23:59:59Z). Either use this parameter together with `dateStart`, or use `dateRange`.

items.description: Filters results by date.

serviceCategory.description: Filters results by Internet service category.

items.description: Filters results by date.
Filters results by location. Specify a valid alpha-2 location code.

location.description: Filters results by location. Specify a comma-separated list of alpha-2 location codes.

domain.description: A valid domain name, e.g., example.com or sub.domain.co.uk. Must follow standard domain formatting rules without protocol or path.

items.description: Filters results by date.

Filters results by date range. For example, use `7d` and `7dcontrol` to compare this week with the previous week. Use this parameter or set specific start and end dates (`dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters).

dateRange.description: Filters results by date range. For example, use `7d` and `7dcontrol` to compare this week with the previous week. Use this parameter or set specific start and end dates (`dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters).

items.description: Start date in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2023-04-01T00:00:00Z). Either use this parameter together with `dateEnd`, or use `dateRange`.

dateStart.description: Start of the date range. Either use this parameter together with `dateEnd` or use `dateRange`.

items.description: End date in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2023-04-30T23:59:59Z). Either use this parameter together with `dateStart`, or use `dateRange`.

dateEnd.description: End of the date range. Either use this parameter together with `dateStart`, or use `dateRange`.

asn.description: Filters results by ASN. Provide an array of ASN strings. Prefix with `-` to exclude (e.g., ["-174", "3356"] excludes AS174 and includes AS3356).

continent.description: Filters results by continent. Provide an array of alpha-2 continent codes (e.g., "EU", "NA"). Prefix a code with `-` to exclude it (e.g., ["-EU", "NA"] excludes Europe and includes North America).

location.description: Filters results by location. Provide an array of alpha-2 country codes (e.g., "US", "PT"). Prefix a code with `-` to exclude it (e.g., ["-US", "PT"] excludes the US and includes Portugal).

dimension.description: Dimension indicating the type and format of HTTP data to retrieve.

tools.name: get_internet_speed_data
tools.description: Retrieve summary of bandwidth, latency, jitter, and packet loss, from the previous 90 days of Cloudflare Speed Test.

items.description: End date in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2023-04-30T23:59:59Z). Either use this parameter together with `dateStart`, or use `dateRange`.

dateEnd.description: End of the date range. Either use this parameter together with `dateStart`, or use `dateRange`.

asn.description: Filters results by ASN. Provide an array of ASN strings. Prefix with `-` to exclude (e.g., ["-174", "3356"] excludes AS174 and includes AS3356).

continent.description: Filters results by continent. Provide an array of alpha-2 continent codes (e.g., "EU", "NA"). Prefix a code with `-` to exclude it (e.g., ["-EU", "NA"] excludes Europe and includes North America).

location.description: Filters results by location. Provide an array of alpha-2 country codes (e.g., "US", "PT"). Prefix a code with `-` to exclude it (e.g., ["-US", "PT"] excludes the US and includes Portugal).

dimension.description: Dimension indicating the type and format of Internet speed data to retrieve.

orderBy.description: Specifies the metric to order the results by. Only allowed for top locations and ASes

tools.name: get_internet_quality_data
tools.description: Retrieves a summary or time series of bandwidth, latency, or DNS response time percentiles from the Radar Internet Quality Index (IQI).

items.description: Filters results by date range. For example, use `7d` and `7dcontrol` to compare this week with the previous week. Use this parameter or set specific start and end dates (`dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters).

dateRange.description: Filters results by date range. For example, use `7d` and `7dcontrol` to compare this week with the previous week. Use this parameter or set specific start and end dates (`dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters).

dateStart.description: Start of the date range. Either use this parameter together with `dateEnd` or use `dateRange`.

items.description: End date in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2023-04-30T23:59:59Z). Either use this parameter together with `dateStart`, or use `dateRange`.

dateEnd.description: End of the date range. Either use this parameter together with `dateStart`, or use `dateRange`.

asn.description: Filters results by ASN. Provide an array of ASN strings. Prefix with `-` to exclude (e.g., ["-174", "3356"] excludes AS174 and includes AS3356).

continent.description: Filters results by continent. Provide an array of alpha-2 continent codes (e.g., "EU", "NA"). Prefix a code with `-` to exclude it (e.g., ["-EU", "NA"] excludes Europe and includes North America).

location.description: Filters results by location. Provide an array of alpha-2 country codes (e.g., "US", "PT"). Prefix a code with `-` to exclude it (e.g., ["-US", "PT"] excludes the US and includes Portugal).

metric.description: Specifies which metric to return (bandwidth, latency, or DNS response time).

tools.name: get_ai_data
tools.description: Retrieves AI-related data, including traffic from AI user agents, as well as popular models and model tasks specifically from Cloudflare Workers AI.
